content: संवादः {@--1@} Speaking together, conversation, dialogue, colloquy; <ls>Mv. 1. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Discussion, debate. {@--3@} Communication of tidings. {@--4@} Information, news {@--5@} Assent, concurrence. {@--6@} Speaking likeness, agreement, similarity, correspondence; रूपसंवादाच्च संशयादनया पृष्टः <ls>Dk.</ls>; (नादः) चित्ताकर्षी परिचित इव श्रोत्रसंवादमेति <ls>Māl. 5. 20.</ls> {@--7@} Meeting, encounter; <ls>U. 5. 16.</ls>
